contentrichtext.text: '''Arundhati''' may refer to: * [[Arundhati (Hinduism)]], the Hindu goddess of the sky, stars and night time ==Literature and Arts== * [[Arundhati (epic)|''Arundhati'' (epic)]], a 1994 Hindi epic poem * [[Arundhati (2009 film)|''Arundhati'' (2009 film)]], a 2009 Telugu film directed by Kodi Ramakrishna * [[Arundhati (1967 film)|''Arundhati'' (1967 film)]], a 1967 Oriya film directed by Prafulla Sengupta ==People== * [[Arundhati Ghose]] (born 1940), Indian diplomat * [[Arundhati Ghosh]] (born 1960), cricketer * [[Arundhati Kirkire]] (born 1980), cricketer * [[Arundhati Nag]], actor * [[Arundhati Roy]] (born 1961), writer * [[Arundhati Virmani]] (born 1957), historian and academic {{disambiguation}} [[Category:Indian given names]]
